concept.title: What is Subtration?
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes what is subtraction operation in Arithmatic.

conbody.p: In Arithmatic, to subtract means to take away or deduct from a group or a number of things. In a subtraction problem, we take away a smaller number, called subtrahend, from a larger number, called minuend. The result of subtraction is called the difference.

example.p: Here 8 is the minuend, 3 is the subtrahend and 5 is the difference.
